title: Exploring the Attraction Sites in the Tenerife and Canary Islands
text:
Travel Articles | August 14, 2015 
If you have been thinking about a wonderful sunny get away there are so many destinations to choose from. In fact sometimes it might be very difficult to settle on one. The next time you are going for a holiday try Tenerife 
It is the biggest of the Spanish Canary Islands and is located in the warm Atlantic waters. Knowing about the secrets of Tenerife and Canary Islands is perhaps the most thrilling fact about the island which has been regarded as one of the world best tourist destinations. This article will tell you some of the best facts and tourist attractions about Tenerife. 
It is a common thing for most countries to have insufficient sunshine hours. For this one of the attractions Tenerife is the island’s climate. It has a mild climate which is often sunny with warm winds all through the year. This makes it a perfect destination all year round. The island is situated in the Atlantic Ocean – just off the Moroccan coast, and surrounds the volcano Mount Teide. The tourists get to enjoy mild temperatures of about 20+ degrees. This is ideal for major beach events such as scuba diving, windsurfing, deep sea fishing excursions and swimming. 
Because of the Island's mild climate, there is usually sunny with warm winds almost year round. Situated between Africa and the ocean, and with the Mount Teide in the middle, Tenerife enjoys some of the mildest weather in the world with average temperatures hovering around 20 degrees. Surfing, windsurfing, snorkeling, scuba diving, deep sea fishing excursions, and swimming in the warm Atlantic waters are but a few of the year-round water sports available to you because of the weather near Tenerife. Besides you can always travel to the Canary Islands and enjoy the experience. 
In 2007 the Teide National Park was made a UNESCO World Heritage site. The mountain is Spain’s highest point and you can get to know more about how the volcanic activity in the mountain leads to the islands around it. If you like mountain climbing or you are feeling fancy to climb you can go up to heights of 3,718. The six hour walk all through the park is a perfect one during your visit. There is so much about the secrets of Tenerife and Canary Islands. The island is of a rugged terrain and has since attracted many visitors from all over the world. The black and sandy volcanic beaches are a lure especially if you prefer a unique holiday. 
Sports, Food and Nightlife 
In any vacation water sports are part of unwinding. Tenerife gives you a while new experience when it comes to horseback trails, cycling and hiking all through the countryside. Golfing is a major activity for vacationers and it is also not left out at Tenerife. The golf courses are well maintained and simply waiting for you to tee off. Another important tourist attractions Tenerife is the nightlife. There are so many entertainment options on the island and is regarded to be one of the best in Europe. Moreover, there are a variety of restaurants which have also entertainment sports so as you enjoy your favorite cuisines you also get entertained. Accommodation in Tenerife Islands is not a concern at all. There is a plethora of attractions Tenerife options and you get to book even before you depart for your journey. This has always been a big concern when travelling. Tenerife has some of the most luxurious hotels in the world, and if you are not sure, then you should check more about the secrets of Tenerife and Canary Islands . You will be guaranteed to enjoy your tourist attractions you will be at peace knowing that you have the best accommodation in place.
